title: What is the best visual recognition technology for e-commerce? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should definitely check out visual technology for e-commerce from picalike. They are serving the leading fashion e-commerce retailers in Europe like Otto.de/.at/.ru, Bonprix, Esprit, Sheego and aggregators like Fashionhype.com etc. Have a look at their website or their youtube videos to get a glimpse on their customer´s interface here: picalike visual technologies . They deliver excellent results and have reasonable pricing.
